title: Whats a Champion Permanent ? And isnt it the same as a Champiom shard ?
body:
http://prntscr.com/b8ne9x Champion Permanent 

http://prntscr.com/b8nev7 Champion Shard

So whats the difference guys ?

replies.body:
I will give an example,

Let's say you own Nautilus right? When Opening a Hextech Chest or Re-rolling in Hextech Crafting you can get a Champion Permanent which means you unlock the champion permanently without spending Essence, 

but if you own the Champion, it gets treated as an unupgradable shard therefore you will have no use but to disenchant or use in Mastery Level 6 & 7
 
Hope this clear things up

This is a pretty good summary.  You get Champion Permanents when you unlock a champion that you already own.  it is distinguished by a gold border around the shard signaling it as a permanent.

You can read more about how this works in our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233)!
